QuestData.Title: Big Game Hunter
QuestData.Description: $n, you are a hunter worthy of our company. From the battlefields of Lordaeron to the deepest jungle, I have rarely witnessed such prowess with weaponry as you have demonstrated.$b$bYou have killed the ferocious Sin'Dall, the elusive Bhag'thera, and the treacherous Tethis. But the true prize is the head of King Bangalash. That white tiger is the reason I am here... yet still, he taunts me from his roost to the south. Kill King Bangalash and your hunting prowess is proven to be second to none.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: He is the deadliest thing in this jungle... other than you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hunt for the head of King Bangalash, the great white tiger.
QuestData.CompletionText: I see you're back, $g old bloke : lass;. King Bangalash has caused me to come crawling back to camp many times. Hang in there.
QuestData.RewardText: Bloody well done! Right-o! Congratulations, $n, for succeeding where others have failed.$b$bI am honored to count you as a comrade of our great hunting party here. No one will ever doubt your expertise in hunting and tracking!$b$bCheers to you, I say! Cheers!
